name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the density functional theory object.

wfmsUUID.title: WFMS UUID
wfmsUUID.description: Unique identifier of the simulation object in the WFMS.

SCFConvergenceThreshold.title: SCF convergence threshold
SCFConvergenceThreshold.description: Threshold for the convergence of the wave function.

XCFunctional.title: XC functional
XCFunctional.description: Approximation used for the exchanged correlation functional.

spinPolarisedCalculation.title: Spin polarised calculation
spinPolarisedCalculation.description: Whether spin polarisation calculation is considered.

initialSpinGuesses.title: Initial spin guesses
initialSpinGuesses.description: Initial value of the magnetisation for each atom.

absoluteMagnetisation.title: Absolute magnetisation
absoluteMagnetisation.description: Output value of the absolute magnetisation.

totalMagnetisation.title: Total magnetisation
totalMagnetisation.description: Output value of the total magnetisation.

totalSpinSquared.title: Total spin squared
totalSpinSquared.description: Output value of the eigenvalue of the square operator to control spin contamination.

netCharge.title: Net charge
netCharge.description: Difference between electronic and ionic charge of the system (+1 means one electron is being removed from the neutral charge system).

smearing.title: Smearing
smearing.description: Energy value for electron broadening function for fractional occupation of orbitals.

fermiDiracTemperature.title: Fermi Dirac temperature
fermiDiracTemperature.description: Temperature used for broadening in case of Fermi-Dirac broadening function for fractional occupation of orbitals.

forceMultiplicity.title: Force multiplicity
forceMultiplicity.description: If True multiplicity is constrained to the input value in a calculation with broadening of the occupation of orbitals.

outputMullikenPopulationAnalysis.title: Output Mulliken population analysis
outputMullikenPopulationAnalysis.description: Charges and magnetic momentum for each atom resulting from Muliken population analysis.

outputHirshfeldPopulationAnalysis.title: Output Hirshfeld population analysis
outputHirshfeldPopulationAnalysis.description: Charges and magnetic momentum for each atom resulting from Hirshfeld population analysis.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Comments to the density functional theory.
